parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sounds

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Plays music defined in [[Description.ext#CfgMusic|Description.ext's CfgMusic]] or config.cpp. If the ''musicName'' could not be found a message is logged into the .rpt file: <tt>Music <''musicName''> not found</tt>.
* [[Arma 3 CfgMusic]]
* [[Arma 2: CfgMusic]]
* [[ArmA: CfgMusic]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> To stop the music, use <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[playMusic]] ""</value></part></template>.</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> See [[Arma 3 CfgMusic]] for possible vanilla values. Since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.67 one can use the [[Arma_3_Utilities#Jukebox|Jukebox Utility]] to preview in-game music.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[playMusic]] musicName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> musicName: [[String]] - music classname

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>[[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[playMusic]] [musicName, start]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> musicName: [[String]] - music classname

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> start: [[Number]] - start, in seconds. Can be negative.

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[playMusic]] "RadioAmbient1";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[playMusic]] ["RadioAmbient3", 3]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>start to play from 00:00:03</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Play from 00:00:01 to 00:00:05:
<code>[] [[spawn]] {
	[[playMusic]] ["RadioAmbient5", 1];
	[[sleep]] 4;
	[[playMusic]] "";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getMusicPlayedTime]], [[playSound]], [[say]], [[createSoundSource]], [[addMusicEventHandler]], [[fadeMusic]]
</value></part></template>
